text: Annemarie Huber-Hotz (16 August 1948 â€“ 1 August 2019) was a Swiss politician. She was the Federal Chancellor of Switzerland between 2000 and 2007. She was nominated by the FDP for the office, and elected to it on 15 December 1999. In 2011, she became President of the Swiss Red Cross and ex officio vice- president of the IFRC.Rotkreuzrat , Swiss Red Cross website. Huber-Hotz died on 1 August 2019 at the age of 70 from a heart attack. ==References== Category:Federal Chancellors of Switzerland Category:People from Zug Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths
title: Annemarie Huber-Hotz
